message.body: John her her number or something. Let her know she shouldn't have to walk if she wants to come again
Some drunk fuck almost hit me on the way home.
You gotta be careful man. You don't need any more accidents anytime soon. Maybe that's a sign to call out tomorrow
I avoided it. He swerved into my lane turning into 83.
Then he drove in the middle of two lanes for the rest of the way.
That's good you avoided it. Yeah it's best to get away from drivers like that. That accident I told you about I was wondering if they were drunk or not
